channel.title: featured on Yukonwoodcraft - Cabinet making & custom furniture
channel.description: Recent content in featured on Yukonwoodcraft - Cabinet making & custom furniture

item.title: Maple Standing Desks
item.description: For this client 5 standing desks for an office were created. The desks feature solid maple veneer tops. The veneers were cut from solid maple blanks to match the grain for each desk. The table tops were mounted on height adjustable bases which makes it possible to use the desk in a standing as well as sitting position.

item.title: Book Shelf
item.description: This client requested a book shelf that complemented the wood accents and design of their house. The shelf was made from fir wood and finished with an natural wax/oil finish.

item.title: Couch Table
item.description: For this project a multi-mode couch table was designed and built. The table is made from solid birch wood. The tapered legs are attached via hand cut joinery. The table can be used in 2 different ways. First in a regular horizontal way and secondly in a vertical position where the legs slide under the couch offering a surface to place i.e. drinks.

item.title: Blanket Chest
item.description: For this client a fir blanket chest was designed and fabricated. The chest features box joinery and a simple modern design. A oil/wax finish has been applied to preserve the natural wood look.

item.title: Kitchen Island
item.description: For this project a custom kitchen island was created. The kitchen island features an extra wide counter top with built in downdraft range as well as 2 book shelves on the backside of the island.

item.title: Recessed wall cabinet
item.description: For this client a cabinet was created that is recessed in the wall. The cabinet is made of birch plywood and fir.

item.title: Park Benches
item.description: For this project a set of 9 matching park benches were created from Cedar wood.
